verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w came|strong="G2064"\w* over \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the other \w side|strong="G4008"\w* of the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*, \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w country|strong="G5561"\w* of the \w Gadarenes|strong="G1046"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G1831"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* was come \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w ship|strong="G4143"\w*, \w immediately|strong="G2112"\w* there \w met|strong="G0528"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w out|strong="G1537"\w* of the \w tombs|strong="G3419"\w* a \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w an|strong="G4151"\w* \w unclean|strong="G0169"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*,

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \add his\add* \w dwelling|strong="G2731"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* the \w tombs|strong="G3419"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w* \w could|strong="G1410"\w* \w bind|strong="G1210"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, no, \w not|strong="G3777"\w* with \w chains|strong="G0254"\w*:

Because \w that|strong="G1223"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* had \w been|strong="G1210"\w* \w often|strong="G4178"\w* \w bound|strong="G1210"\w* with \w fetters|strong="G3976"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w chains|strong="G0254"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w chains|strong="G0254"\w* had been plucked \w asunder|strong="G1288"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w fetters|strong="G3976"\w* broken in \w pieces|strong="G4937"\w*: \w neither|strong="G2532"\w* \w could|strong="G2480"\w* \w any|strong="G3762"\w* \add man\add* \w tame|strong="G1150"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w always|strong="G1275"\w*, \w night|strong="G3571"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*, he \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w mountains|strong="G3735"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w tombs|strong="G3418"\w*, \w crying|strong="G2896"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w cutting|strong="G2629"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* with \w stones|strong="G3037"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* when he \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w afar|strong="G3113"\w* \w off|strong="G0575"\w*, he \w ran|strong="G5143"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w worshipped|strong="G4352"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w cried|strong="G2896"\w* with \w a|strong="G5456"\w* \w loud|strong="G3173"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w*, and \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w What|strong="G5101"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G1698"\w* to do \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \add thou\add* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w the|strong="G2316"\w* most \w high|strong="G5310"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*? I \w adjure|strong="G3726"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w* by \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, that thou \w torment|strong="G0928"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* he \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Come out|strong="G1831"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w the man|strong="G0444"\+w*, \+add thou\+add* \+w unclean|strong="G0169"\+w* \+w spirit|strong="G4151"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w What|strong="G5101"\+w* \+add is\+add* \+w thy|strong="G4671"\+w* \+w name|strong="G3686"\+w*?\wj* \w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w answered|strong="G0611"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w My|strong="G3427"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \add is\add* \w Legion|strong="G3003"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* we \w are|strong="G2070"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w besought|strong="G3870"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he \w would|strong="G0649"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w send|strong="G0649"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* away out \w of|strong="G1854"\w* the \w country|strong="G5561"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* there \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w* \w nigh|strong="G4314"\w* unto the \w mountains|strong="G3735"\w* \w a|strong="G0034"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w herd|strong="G0034"\w* of \w swine|strong="G5519"\w* \w feeding|strong="G1006"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w devils|strong="G1142"\w* \w besought|strong="G3870"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Send|strong="G3992"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w swine|strong="G5519"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* we may \w enter|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w forthwith|strong="G2112"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w gave|strong="G2010"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w leave|strong="G2010"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G4151"\w* \w unclean|strong="G0169"\w* \w spirits|strong="G4151"\w* went \w out|strong="G1831"\w*, and \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w swine|strong="G5519"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w herd|strong="G0034"\w* ran \w violently|strong="G3729"\w* \w down|strong="G2596"\w* a steep \w place|strong="G2911"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*, (they \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w about|strong="G5613"\w* two \w thousand|strong="G1367"\w*;) \w and|strong="G2532"\w* were \w choked|strong="G4155"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they that \w fed|strong="G1006"\w* the \w swine|strong="G5519"\w* \w fled|strong="G5343"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w told|strong="G0312"\w* \add it\add* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* the \w country|strong="G0068"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* they went \w out|strong="G1831"\w* to \w see|strong="G1492"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* it \w was|strong="G2076"\w* that was \w done|strong="G1096"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w see|strong="G2334"\w* him that was possessed with the \w devil|strong="G1139"\w*, and \w had|strong="G2192"\w* the \w legion|strong="G3003"\w*, \w sitting|strong="G2521"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w clothed|strong="G2439"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* in his right \w mind|strong="G4993"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they were \w afraid|strong="G5399"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they that \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \add it\add* \w told|strong="G1334"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* it befell to him that was possessed with the \w devil|strong="G1139"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add also\add* \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* the \w swine|strong="G5519"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w began|strong="G0756"\w* to \w pray|strong="G3870"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* to \w depart|strong="G0565"\w* \w out|strong="G0575"\w* \w of|strong="G3725"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w coasts|strong="G3725"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G1684"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* was \w come|strong="G1684"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w ship|strong="G4143"\w*, he that had been possessed with the \w devil|strong="G1139"\w* \w prayed|strong="G3870"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he might \w be|strong="G5600"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Howbeit|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w suffered|strong="G0863"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Go|strong="G5217"\+w* \+w home|strong="G3624"\+w* \+w to|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w thy friends|strong="G4674"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w tell|strong="G0312"\+w* \+w them|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w how great things|strong="G3745"\+w* \+w the Lord|strong="G2962"\+w* \+w hath done|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w for thee|strong="G4671"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w hath had compassion on|strong="G1653"\+w* \+w thee|strong="G4571"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w departed|strong="G0565"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w began|strong="G0756"\w* to \w publish|strong="G2784"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Decapolis|strong="G1179"\w* how great \w things|strong="G3745"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* had \w done|strong="G4160"\w* for \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \add men\add* did \w marvel|strong="G2296"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G1276"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* was passed \w over|strong="G1276"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w ship|strong="G4143"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the other \w side|strong="G4008"\w*, \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w people|strong="G3793"\w* \w gathered|strong="G4863"\w* \w unto|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w was|strong="G2258"\w* nigh \w unto|strong="G3844"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, there \w cometh|strong="G2064"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* of the rulers of the \w synagogue|strong="G0752"\w*, \w Jairus|strong="G2383"\w* by \w name|strong="G3686"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* when he \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, he \w fell|strong="G4098"\w* \w at|strong="G4314"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w besought|strong="G3870"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w greatly|strong="G4183"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w My|strong="G3450"\w* little \w daughter|strong="G2365"\w* \w lieth|strong="G2192"\w* at the point of \w death|strong="G2079"\w*: \add I pray thee\add*, \w come|strong="G2064"\w* and \w lay|strong="G2007"\w* thy \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* on \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \w that|strong="G3704"\w* she may be \w healed|strong="G4982"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* she shall \w live|strong="G2198"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \add Jesus\add* \w went|strong="G0565"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w people|strong="G3793"\w* \w followed|strong="G0190"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w thronged|strong="G4918"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G1135"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w woman|strong="G1135"\w*, which \w had|strong="G5607"\w* an \w issue|strong="G4511"\w* of \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* had \w suffered|strong="G3958"\w* many \w things|strong="G4183"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w physicians|strong="G2395"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* had \w spent|strong="G1159"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w that|strong="G3844"\w* \w she|strong="G1438"\w* \w had|strong="G3844"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G5623"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3367"\w* \w bettered|strong="G5623"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w rather|strong="G3123"\w* \w grew|strong="G2064"\w* \w worse|strong="G5501"\w*,

When she had \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w press|strong="G3793"\w* \w behind|strong="G3693"\w*, and \w touched|strong="G0680"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w garment|strong="G2440"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* she \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \w If|strong="G2579"\w* I may \w touch|strong="G0680"\w* \w but|strong="G2579"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w clothes|strong="G2440"\w*, I shall be \w whole|strong="G4982"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w straightway|strong="G2112"\w* the \w fountain|strong="G4077"\w* \w of|strong="G0129"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* was dried \w up|strong="G3583"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* she \w felt|strong="G1097"\w* in her \w body|strong="G4983"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* she was \w healed|strong="G2390"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* that \w plague|strong="G3148"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w immediately|strong="G2112"\w* \w knowing|strong="G1921"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w that|strong="G1921"\w* \w virtue|strong="G1411"\w* had gone \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, turned him \w about|strong="G1994"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w press|strong="G3793"\w*, and \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj  \+w Who|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w touched|strong="G0680"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w clothes|strong="G2440"\+w*?\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, Thou \w seest|strong="G0991"\w* the \w multitude|strong="G3793"\w* \w thronging|strong="G4918"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* sayest \w thou|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Who|strong="G5101"\w* \w touched|strong="G0680"\w* \w me|strong="G3450"\w*?
\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he looked round \w about|strong="G4017"\w* to \w see|strong="G1492"\w* her that had \w done|strong="G4160"\w* this \w thing|strong="G5124"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* the \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* \w fearing|strong="G5399"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w trembling|strong="G5141"\w*, \w knowing|strong="G1492"\w* \w what|strong="G3739"\w* was \w done|strong="G1096"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* fell down \w before|strong="G4363"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w told|strong="G2036"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Daughter|strong="G2364"\+w*, \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w faith|strong="G4102"\+w* \+w hath made|strong="G4982"\+w* \+w thee|strong="G4571"\+w* \+w whole|strong="G4982"\+w*; \+w go|strong="G5217"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w peace|strong="G1515"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w be|strong="G2468"\+w* \+w whole|strong="G5199"\+w* \+w of|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w plague|strong="G3148"\+w*.\wj*

\w While|strong="G2980"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w yet|strong="G2089"\w* \w spake|strong="G2980"\w*, there \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the ruler of the \w synagogueâ€™s|strong="G0752"\w* \add house certain\add* which \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w daughter|strong="G2364"\w* is \w dead|strong="G0599"\w*: \w why|strong="G5101"\w* troublest \w thou|strong="G4660"\w* the \w Master|strong="G1320"\w* any \w further|strong="G2089"\w*?

As soon \w as|strong="G2112"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* that was \w spoken|strong="G2980"\w*, he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto the ruler of the \w synagogue|strong="G0752"\w*, \wj  \+w Be|strong="G5399"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w afraid|strong="G5399"\+w*, \+w only|strong="G3440"\+w* \+w believe|strong="G4100"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w suffered|strong="G0863"\w* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w* to \w follow|strong="G4870"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w save|strong="G1487"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w James|strong="G2385"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* the \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* of \w James|strong="G2385"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w cometh|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w house|strong="G3624"\w* of the ruler of the \w synagogue|strong="G0752"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w seeth|strong="G2334"\w* the \w tumult|strong="G2351"\w*, and them that \w wept|strong="G2799"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wailed|strong="G0214"\w* \w greatly|strong="G4183"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when he was come \w in|strong="G1525"\w*, he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Why|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w make ye this ado|strong="G2350"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w weep|strong="G2799"\+w*? \+w the damsel|strong="G3813"\+w* \+w is|strong="G0599"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w dead|strong="G0599"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w sleepeth|strong="G2518"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w laughed|strong="G2606"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* to \w scorn|strong="G2606"\w*. \w But|strong="G1161"\w* when he had put \w them|strong="G1544"\w* \w all|strong="G0537"\w* \w out|strong="G1544"\w*, he \w taketh|strong="G3880"\w* the \w father|strong="G3962"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w mother|strong="G3384"\w* of the \w damsel|strong="G3813"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* them that were \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* entereth \w in|strong="G1531"\w* \w where|strong="G3699"\w* the \w damsel|strong="G3813"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w lying|strong="G0345"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w took|strong="G2902"\w* the \w damsel|strong="G3813"\w* by the \w hand|strong="G5495"\w*, and \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Talitha|strong="G5008"\+w* \+w cumi|strong="G2891"\+w*;\wj* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w*, being \w interpreted|strong="G3177"\w*, \w Damsel|strong="G2877"\w*, I \w say|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*, \w arise|strong="G1453"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w straightway|strong="G2112"\w* the \w damsel|strong="G2877"\w* \w arose|strong="G0450"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w walked|strong="G4043"\w*; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* she \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \add of the age\add* \w of|strong="G2094"\w* \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* they were \w astonished|strong="G1839"\w* \w with|strong="G1611"\w* a \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w astonishment|strong="G1611"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w charged|strong="G1291"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w straitly|strong="G4183"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* no \w man|strong="G3367"\w* should \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \w it|strong="G5124"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w commanded|strong="G2036"\w* that something should be \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* to \w eat|strong="G5315"\w*.
